abstract: A tax expert calculates how filers at different income levels and in different household situations would be affected by a flat-tax option.
snippet: A tax expert calculates how filers at different income levels and in different household situations would be affected by a flat-tax option.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, who is seeking the Republican presidential nomination, today released some details on his flat tax proposal. The plan would give Americans the option of determining their taxes based on an alternate system that has one tax rate and fewer deductions.

headline.main: How Rick Perry's Tax Plan Would Affect You
